p: The genus Dorema D. Don, belongs to the Apiaceae family (Umbelliferae) with important medicinal and aromatic species. It contains a total of 12 accepted species worldwide ( http://www.theplantlist.org). Among them 7 are represented in Iran [ 1]. The genus has been used as a food additive as well as for various medicinal purposes in traditional and folklore medicine around the world [ 2].
